name: space sucks - LD42
description:
Suck away the world until there's nothing left, then shoot it out at your friends and enemies (assuming they're different). It's endless fun, until the fun ends...

Right Mouse - sucks tiles to gain meter (also leaves void in the ground)
Left Mouse  - shoot grenades that creates blocks
W A S D     - move
Aim with the mouse.

Credits
Music - 8bit Dungeon Boss (Kevin MacLeod)
